xal.extension.bricks

Class ViewNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.extension.bricks.Brick
      • xal.extension.bricks.BeanNode<java.awt.Component>
        • xal.extension.bricks.ViewNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BrickListener, ViewNodeContainer, DataListener

    public class ViewNode
extends BeanNode<java.awt.Component>
implements ViewNodeContainer
    brick which represents a view
